metadata.description: They are magical! Their strength lies in feeling and finding those in need.

drops.title: Deplone
drops.subtitle: Deplone is a young visual artist, who turned his life upside down to chase what he really loves. Since he discovered his passion for 3D art and motion design he has developed his own distinct style. Tries to stay humble and anonymous. Works often influenced by the events from his personal life or day-to-day reflections about the world around him.
drops.description: This 6 piece collection was created with an intention to admire certain elements important to the creative process, but also life in general. The aim of every one of these six artworks is to make the new owner just take a small break and ponder about one of those topics, as well as admire their influence on the surrounding world. I chose the form factor of a surreal museum-like space, because ever since I was a small child, I thought about modern art galleries as the calm, quiet places designed to let the observer admire and reflect upon the odd, non-conventional and often controversial concepts. I hope that events taking place in this little space I designed in my head will succeed in their goal.

drops.title: lazyhorse
drops.description: The Lazy Horse Race Club connects the metaverse and real thoroughbred horse racing in a fun and unique club. Each Lazy Horse NFT grants access to the metaverse clubhouse and Lazy Horse Racing Game (drops end of January!), it also connects you to our real racing team. The Club owns, maintains and races horses with profits being shared by the community. All of the club's efforts are most importantly focused on providing a long and sustainable post-racing life for all horses. A large portion of all project proceeds will directly fund equine rescue and retirement, ensuring great lives for these beautiful animals.

drops.title: CROugars
drops.subtitle: A limited collection of 2,222 NFTs with a variety of hand-drawn attributes. Deployed on the Cronos Chain.
drops.description: CROugars is a limited collection of 2,222 NFTs with a variety of hand-drawn attributes. Deployed on the Cronos Chain. This project has a strong focus on real NFT utilities, some of which, Cronos has not yet seen. This includes NFT staking that shares royalties with holders, as well as DAO governance that allows CROugar holders to vote on proposals.

drops.title: Fractals
drops.description: The Fractals connects the metaverse and real thoroughbred horse racing in a fun and unique club. Each Lazy Horse NFT grants access to the metaverse clubhouse and Lazy Horse Racing Game (drops end of January!), it also connects you to our real racing team. The Club owns, maintains and races horses with profits being shared by the community. All of the club's efforts are most importantly focused on providing a long and sustainable post-racing life for all horses. A large portion of all project proceeds will directly fund equine rescue and retirement, ensuring great lives for these beautiful animals.

drops.title: Cronos goats
drops.description: OG Goats is a limited collection of 1000 NFT's on the Cronos Network. Our Goats main focus is Utility for the community. We will be implementing a buy back feature where half of all the royalties go towards buying the lowest ranked Goats so we can take them off the market for a minimum of 8 years. Our OG Goats will act as a major discount ticket to our second collection of Bad Billy Goats. We will also Gift our community with physical art pieces of their NFT's! The future for these goats are endless as we plan to implement a DEX, NFT staking, P2E games, and Cronos's First NFT art Gallery.

drops.title: Space Crystal Unicorns
drops.subtitle: They are magical! Their strength lies in feeling and finding those in need. All funds raised will be used to support hippotherapy classes for children with disabilities.
drops.description:
Hello everyone, 

I have always had a passion for art which most already know, but what most don’t know is that I am very fond of equestrian sports. Growing up I self-taught to become an equestrian rider. I have also judged equestrian events and competitions and organized charity festivals in support of children with disabilities. 

Riding horses can be very healing for children and their psycho-emotional state and for those who become more involved, assists with muscle development. I used to coach children for free but have retired from this. However, I keep in close contact with the equestrian club in my hometown and occasionally still assist by running the group classes for children. I also financially support and support them with media coverage, assisting with fund raising to help kids receive this amazing and free therapy with horses.

To support the equestrian club and children, I am auctioning a limited-edition 1:1 ‘Rare Heart Hodler’ NFT. It also comes with a T-shirt and an autographed card from myself. Additionally, 10 holders of the 'Heart Hodler' from the open edition will be randomly selected to receive a physical autographed card from myself

auctions.title: Horse 1
auctions.description: The Lazy Horse Race Club will be supporting SaddleUp!, a charity based out of Nashville, TN. Specifically, proceeds will be donated to the Lauren and Charlotte Uribe Pony Fund. This fund's purpose is to provide 10 therapy horses to help replenish SaddleUp!'s therapy herd, helping to provide thousands of additional therapy sessions for children and adults with intellectual or developmental disabilities.

auctions.title: Horse 2
auctions.description: The Lazy Horse Race Club will be supporting SaddleUp!, a charity based out of Nashville, TN. Specifically, proceeds will be donated to the Lauren and Charlotte Uribe Pony Fund. This fund's purpose is to provide 10 therapy horses to help replenish SaddleUp!'s therapy herd, helping to provide thousands of additional therapy sessions for children and adults with intellectual or developmental disabilities.

auctions.title: Croskull 1
auctions.description: The CroSkull team will be supporting Cancer Research UK, a charity within England and Wales. Proceeds will be donated and used to provide labs with research chemicals, continue operation of mobile awareness units to provide early diagnosis to visitors, provide free cancer clinical trials to those in need, tools for advanced DNA sequencing, and chat support for those emotionally affected by their own or a loved one's diagnosis and treatment.
